com.netflix.genie.common.model

Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.model.Auditable
      • com.netflix.genie.common.model.CommonEntityFields
        • com.netflix.genie.common.model.Job
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validate, java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Job
extends CommonEntityFields
    Representation of the state of a Genie 2.0 job.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Job

      • Job

        public Job(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String commandArgs,
           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> commandCriteria,
           java.util.List<ClusterCriteria> clusterCriterias,
           java.lang.String version)
        Construct a new Job.
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user running the job. Not null/empty/blank.
        name - The name specifed for the job
        commandArgs - The command line arguments for the job. Not null/empty/blank.
        commandCriteria - The criteria for the command. Not null/empty.
        clusterCriterias - The cluster criteria for the job. Not null/empty.
        version - The version of this job
